name: Super Grouper
description:
Made for the SyntaxBomb "There can only be one' competition Aug-Oct 2021.

'Bullet' the Blue Gilled Grouper and his roe have been flushed down a drain during a fierce Tropical Storm.  With a single button help him on his perilous journey home, find his roe and most importantly keep him alive!

On your journey you'll come across hungry predators, pack hunters, easy meals and some weird and wonderful obstacles to overcome.

Good luck Super Grouper!
